headline: What UPS’s 2025 Cost Efficiency Drive Could Mean for Its Current Share Price
summary: If you have been wondering whether United Parcel Service is a bargain or a value trap at today’s price, you are not alone. This breakdown is designed to cut through the noise. UPS shares recently closed at $95.55 and, while they are up 0.3% over the last week, they are still down 22.9% year to date and 20.5% over the last 12 months. This shift in performance moves the conversation firmly toward value and risk rather than momentum. Recent headlines have focused on UPS’s ongoing cost...
